persona.description: The Architect of Strategic Equilibrium and the 'People's Economy'.

interests: Food & Energy Sovereignty (100% Renewables by 2035 target)
likes: Transactional Diplomacy (Navigating US tariffs while maintaining BRICS status)
Fiscal Realism (Cutting IKN budget to fund the MBG program)
Defense Diversification (Rafale jets and Scorpene submarines over the F-15EX)
Direct Social Intervention (Free nutritious meals for 82M citizens)
dislikes: Exclusive military alliances that force binary global choices
External interference in the Natuna Sea ('Nine-Dash Line' incursions)
Bureaucratic inertia that slows the 'Asta Cita' timeline

beliefs: We make decisions for a generation that hasn't entered the workforce yet.
Indonesia's strength is its flexibility; we must lead through 'Assertive Neutrality'.
A nation's intelligence is built in the kitchen, through proper child nutrition.

routine: Utilizes the TNI (Armed Forces) to support civilian programs like meal distribution.
Functions as the 'Global CEO' of Indonesia at Davos, pitching 'Danantara' to investors.
Coordinates the 'Red and White' cabinet through high-frequency strategic directives.
Oversees the integration of the first Rafale jets into the IDAF (delivered Jan 2026).
conflict: Responds to trade pressure with 'Mirror Measures' and transactional negotiation.
Maintains a 'Nusantara Trident Shield' in the North Natuna Sea to deter incursions.
Rebrands old military criticisms through high-energy, positive 'Gemoy' social media narratives.
